original_title: Investigation into possible Grade 5 Scholarship Exam paper leak
original_body_lines: The Commissioner General of Examinations Amit Jayasundara says that investigations are to be held tomorrow (18) into three questions shared for discussions yesterday being similar to those on the Grade 5 Scholarship exam paper.
Speaking to Ada Derana, he stated that if investigations uncover that the questions have in fact been leaked, these questions would be disregarded during the paper marking process.
